Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Nephritis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Inflammation of any part of the KIDNEY.
Inflammation of the kidney. It is a focal or diffuse proliferative or destructive process which may involve the glomerulus, tubule, or interstitial renal tissue.
